sub_topic: Show that every group of order 16 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C16, the dihedral group D8, or the non-abelian group of order 16.
message_1: How many non-abelian groups of order 16 are there? Show that every non-abelian group of order 16 is isomorphic to the same group.

Number of groups = (p^(n^2) - p^(n(n-1)/2)) / (p^n - p^(n-1))
